Close the lid tightly and shake the jar until the dressing is well combined."},{"recipe_directions":"Combine in a salad bowl beans, corn, avocado, bell pepper, tomatoes, green onions, and cilantro."},{"recipe_directions":"Shake dressing again, pour over salad, and toss to coat."}]

Chill in refrigerator for at least 12 hours."},{"recipe_directions":"Dotdash Meredith Food Studios"},{"recipe_directions":"Enjoy!"},{"recipe_directions":"DOTDASH MEREDITH FOOD STUDIOS"}]
